trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection"></xref> objects in a control that is derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"></xref> or a similar control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListItemsCollectionEditor> class provides a user interface for editing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> object within a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> or a similar control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListItemsCollectionEditor> is invoked by selecting the ellipsis (**…**) button on the **ListItems** property in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListItemsCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A> method always returns `false` to indicate that only one object can be selected at a time in the editor.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListItemsCollectionEditor.HelpTopic%2A> property returns the name of the Help topic that the editor displays.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListItemsCollectionEditor"></xref> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListItemsCollectionEditor> class when you select the ellipsis (**…**) button on the **ListItems** property in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer, when designing a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class or other control that encapsulates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> object.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the collection to edit.
Gets a value indicating whether multiple <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem"></xref> elements can be selected at one time.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListItemsCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A> method always returns `false`; thus, only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object can be selected at a time in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListItemsCollectionEditor> object.
Gets the Help topic to display for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListItemsCollectionEditor"></xref> object.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListItemsCollectionEditor.HelpTopic%2A> property gets the name of the Help topic to display when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListItemsCollectionEditor> dialog box **Help** button is clicked or when the **F1** key is pressed.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that specifies the Help topic to display.
